data.event: In 1965, Florence was named an All-American City, presented by the National Civic League.
As of 2013, the city retains its status as a major hub, both for industry and infrastructure, while establishing itself as a regional center for business, medicine, culture and finance.
The City of Florence was chartered in 1871 and incorporated in 1890 following the 1888 creation of Florence County.
The City of Florence was chartered in 1871 and incorporated in 1890 following the 1888 creation of Florence County.

event.title: laid out by the Lords Proprieters in 1719

data.event: Prior to its charter, the city was part of one of the original townships laid out by the Lords Proprieters in 1719.
